statements: SELECT * FROM recordings;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM recordings;
SELECT id, release_date FROM recordings ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM recordings WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT artist_name, release_date FROM recordings WHERE artist_name LIKE 'The%';
SELECT * FROM recordings WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) as num_recordings FROM recordings GROUP BY artist_name HAVING num_recordings > 1;
SELECT id, artist_name, release_date FROM recordings WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01' AND genre IN ('Pop', 'Hip Hop') ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_records, genre FROM recordings GROUP BY genre HAVING total_records > 2 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT artist_name, MIN(release_date) as first_release, MAX(release_date) as latest_release FROM recordings GROUP BY artist_name ORDER BY latest_release DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_recordings WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT artist_name, release_date FROM music_recordings ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM music_recordings WHERE release_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM music_recordings WHERE genre IN ('Pop', 'Hip Hop') ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT artist_name, release_date, genre FROM music_recordings WHERE genre='Rock' ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE nationality='USA' ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT artist_name, release_date FROM music_recordings WHERE genre='Pop' AND artist_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists ORDER BY nationality, artist_name;
SELECT artist_name, release_date, genre FROM music_recordings WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY genre, release_date;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, artist_id FROM artists WHERE artist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT album_id, album_name, release_date FROM albums ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT track_name, duration FROM tracks WHERE duration > 300;
SELECT * FROM albums WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, artist_id FROM artists ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT album_name, release_date, genre FROM albums WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT track_name, duration, track_number FROM tracks ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT artists.artist_name, albums.album_name, tracks.track_name FROM artists INNER JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.artist_id INNER JOIN tracks ON albums.album_id = tracks.album_id;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, artist_country FROM artists;
SELECT album_title, release_date FROM albums WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT track_title, duration FROM tracks ORDER BY track_number DESC;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres WHERE genre_description LIKE '%pop%';
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, artist_country FROM artists ORDER BY artist_country ASC;
SELECT artist_name, artist_genre FROM artists WHERE artist_country = 'USA';
SELECT album_title, release_date FROM albums JOIN artists ON albums.artist_id = artists.artist_id WHERE artist_genre = 'Rock';
SELECT track_title, duration FROM tracks JOIN albums ON tracks.album_id = albums.album_id WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name FROM artists WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT track_name, duration FROM tracks WHERE album_id = 1;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres WHERE genre_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, artist_id FROM artists ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT album_name, release_date, artist_name FROM albums JOIN artists ON albums.artist_id = artists.artist_id;
SELECT track_name, duration, album_name, artist_name FROM tracks JOIN albums ON tracks.album_id = albums.album_id JOIN artists ON albums.artist_id = artists.artist_id ORDER BY album_name, track_name;
SELECT track_name, genre_name FROM tracks JOIN track_genres ON tracks.track_id = track_genres.track_id JOIN genres ON track_genres.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
